August 20, 2015, Rebecca was senior to Mark but didn’t manage directly

I have known Mark personally for several years now and have known of him, professionally, most of my 35 years in the Phoenix business and professional community.  In my view, Mark is smart, principled and has outstanding communications skills, adept at fashioning a message as well as eliciting useful feedback.  On a personal level, Mark is an extrovert, perpetually smiling and genuinely interested in other people.  This translates well on a business level as he makes friends easily and enjoys an extensive network of acquaintances and colleagues in all spheres of business and politics. He is also generous with his contacts, offering helpful feedback and opening doors to connect others. In this regard, I believe Mark understands better than most that business development is a "big picture" exercise, one that requires relationship-building first, then marketing.  I have also been impressed by Mark' knowledge of current affairs and, based on extensive interaction with him on this level, know that he closely follows national, state and local policy matters and, on occasion, participates in the political process.In sum, I think highly of Mark and look forward to his continued professional success.

I have known Mark Hiegel for a few years and have enjoyed every minute of our collaboration.  Mark is always responsive, effective and timely. The events we have worked on together have run smoothly and been well received by attendees. He has encouraged participation by reticent people who have been thankful to be persuaded. Mark sees the big picture and knows what it takes to create a successful environment. I hope to be working with him for years to come.

My work with Mark at Greenberg Traurig was phenomenal. First and foremost Mark is a quality person with a genuine desire to help others. He is a great networking mentor and has a great ability to find the synergies between people and bridge the gaps. Mark has a keen sense of practical and useful marketing techniques for any business person. He is also quite convincing when he makes "recommendations"!  I would recommend Mark to anyone and look forward to working with him myself in the future.

Don is a very knowledgeable and dedicated individual who understands the nuances of business, marketing and especially media. I've had the pleasure of working with him in both the business and non-profit arenas where he consistently develops a clear view of what needs to be done, a plan to get it done, and coordinates his team and colleagues to great effect. Don's vision, technical and business knowledge, and connections have made him an incredible asset to me and anyone who is fortunate enough cross paths with him. Don has been a friend and mentor to me  and I highly recommend him and DH Advisors.

Ruben reported to me in his role of Print Production Manager at Lavidge Hiegel Communications and we spent 8 years together. At that time I was the CEO of or rapidly growing agency Ruben did excellent work, and we were truly sorry to see him go. He is smart and skilled, but more importantly he is an outstanding manager. He oversaw our traffic and production groups. His natural people skills and intuitive leadership style earned him respect in his department and throughout the company. His helped build camaraderie between all groups and his influence was felt long after he left. Ruben was also responsible for print production management, estimating hours and all related outside hard costs, as well as proactively negotiating and purchasing outside hard costs and services (publication materials, sheet fed, web and specialty printing, fulfillment, incentives, illustration, photography and freelance talent). Ruben was also influential in revamping and standardizing all internal employee billing codes which facilitated time keeping and client billing.

summary: Senior Marketing/Advertising and Business Development Executive with a proven and measurable track record with Entrepreneurial experience including Marketing, Advertising, Public Relations and Management. Past employee of “Fortune top 50” company with extensive background in brand management, market identification, segmentation and penetration programs to increase production and market share for employer and client organizations. Large scope domestic and international business manager providing a unique perspective and skills on local, regional and global markets. Active and past member of over 20 + civic and philanthropic boards. Utilizes creative, innovative and custom solutions to solve critical problems for employers with cutting-edge expectations.
name: Mark Hiegel
title: President and Chief Executive Officer of the Scottsdale Area Chamber of Commerce
